thread.title: My Fuzzy Friend: soft coated wheaten terrier owned by Holly Holderman
thread.title_full: My Fuzzy Friend: soft coated wheaten terrier owned by Holly Holderman - The Morning Call

author: mcall.com
title: My Fuzzy Friend: soft coated wheaten terrier owned by Holly Holderman
text:
•Name: Holly Holderman
•Hometown: Whitehall
•Type of pet: Dog
•Name: Nala
•Age: 8 months
•Breed: Soft coated wheaten terrier
•Gender: Female
•Why she is my friend: Because she is filled with so much love.
•In four words: Love, wild, beautiful, smart
•Best trait: Her Teddy bear face. It's like owning a real Teddy bear.
•Personality: Very smart, very crazy, she loves everyone.
•A funny story: I didn't tell my mom we were buying a dog. When I brought Nala to my mom's, she wasn't home so I sent her a picture of Nala and said, "Meet your new granddog." She was very upset. She told me that Nala better not be there when she got home; of course we weren't gonna leave. My mom walked in the door and Nala ran right to her. Within 2 minutes Nala was in her arms. It was love at first sight. (Nala could steal anyone's heart.) Now Nala goes to her ma's house every day while her mommy and daddy work.
•Loves: To be outside playing, and she loves to go to doggy day care.
•Tricks: Gives paw, sit, stay, touch, high five.
•Exercise: Running and playing with her puppy friends at Leader Of The Pack doggy day care.
•Nicknames: Sunshine, Nal, Pretty girl.
•Shows affection by: Hugging and kissing.
•Can usually be found: Wherever her daddy is.
•Likes to be rubbed: Belly
•Favorite toy: Her lamb chop.
•Favorite treat: Beef jerky, ice cubes, her Kong.
•Afraid of: Vacuum cleaner.
•Worst habit: Jumping when people come in.
•Where she sleeps: In her big girl bed.
•Favorite animal friend: Otis, Ed, Barney and Harley.
•Strange but true: Nala isn't just a dog, she is my fur baby.
•Additional comments: She can put a smile on anyone's face. She has so much love to give.
